net.usikkert.kouinject
Class BeanData

java.lang.Object
  net.usikkert.kouinject.BeanData

public class BeanData
extends java.lang.Object

This class describes the bean meta-data needed to instantiate a new bean to a consistent state.

Author:
Christian Ihle

mapDependencies

public void mapDependencies()
Finds required class dependencies in the constructor, in fields and in methods.

This method cannot be run before:

  • setConstructor(Constructor) (optional)
  • setFields(List)
  • setMethods(List)

The result will be available in getDependencies().

getDependencies

public java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getDependencies()
All required class dependencies will be in this list after mapDependencies() has been run.

Returns:
All class dependencies for getBeanClass().
